title: Keep Writing with Fey: Sparks to Defeat Writer's Block, Depression, and Burnout
description: *No longer in publication.*Catch the sparks you need to conquer writer’s block, depression, and burnout!When Chrys Fey shared her story about depression and burnout, it struck a chord with other writers. That put into perspective for her how desperate writers are to hear they aren’t alone. Many creative types experience these challenges, battling to recover. Let Keep Writing with Fey: Sparks to Defeat Writer's Block, Depression, and Burnout guide you through:•	Writer's block•	Depression•	Writer's burnout•	What a writer doesn’t need to succeed•	Finding creativity boostsWith these sparks, you can begin your journey of rediscovering your creativity and get back to what you love - writing.
author: Chrys Fey
